Title: Year of the Horse
Writer: Grant Morrison (developed by), Brian Taylor (developed by), Noelle Valdivia (teleplay by), Matthew White (executive story editor), Ken Kristensen (story editor), Grant Morrison (based on the comic by), Darick Robertson (based on the comic by)
Actors: Christopher Meloni, Ritchie Coster, Lili Mirojnick, Medina Senghore
Plot: Sax and Happy follow the trail to Chinatown. Blue's sister wants revenge for the death of her sons. Merry closes in on Very Bad Santa.
